description: Kirisaki Kyouko is an energetic, bubbly high school student who has the ability to create and control fire. She is so carefree that she will kill the enemies of the Apostles without a second thought, often kissing them and burning them from the inside. She leaves the Apostles of the Stars with Charden, so he won`t be lonely. Kyouko starts to like Train when she first meets him, and falls in love with him when he saves her from a thief. Due to her feelings, she commits herself to Train`s own personal philosophy to not kill senselessly.
name: Kirisaki Kyouko
